body_html: @mrry — If I've got that right, it would be extremely helpful to see how I might rewrite the full code example in my SO question to take advantage of some of the related TF API (e.g., train.batch and batch_join, perhaps).

body: @mrry — If I've got that right, it would be extremely helpful to see how I might rewrite the full code example in [my SO question](http://stackoverflow.com/q/37327312/656912) to take advantage of some of the related TF API (e.g., `train.batch` and `batch_join`, perhaps).
